TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataConnectionFile extends Microsoft.SharePoint.Administration.SPPersistedObject implements class Microsoft.SharePoint.Administration.Backup.IBackupRestore, class Microsoft.SharePoint.Administration.Backup.IBackupRestoreConfiguration
Public NotInheritable Class DataConnectionFile Inherits SPPersistedObject Implements IBackupRestoreConfiguration
type DataConnectionFile = class inherit SPPersistedObject interface IBackupRestoreConfiguration interface IBackupRestore

Docs.summary: Represents a Universal Data Connection (UDC) file located in the central data connection store on a server farm.

remarks.para: The UDC files that are available on the server farm are listed on the Manage Data Connection Files page of the Central Administration site. A version 2 UDC file with the *.udcx file extension is designed for use by browser-enabled form templates that render in the browser or open in the InfoPath editor. Form templates that are not browser-enabled can also use UDC connection files.

example.para: In the following example, the collection is used to loop through every UDC file on the server farm and write its display name to the console. Then the total number of UDC files on the server is written to the console.
example.code: Dim LocalFormsService As FormsService Dim LocalFarm As SPFarm Dim UdcCollection As DataConnectionFileCollection Dim UdcConnection As DataConnectionFile Dim CountUdcFiles As Integer = 0 Try LocalFarm = SPFarm.Local LocalFormsService = LocalFarm.Services.GetValue(Of FormsService)(FormsService.ServiceName) UdcCollection = LocalFormsService.DataConnectionFiles For Each UdcConnection In UdcCollection CountUdcFiles = CountUdcFiles + 1 Console.WriteLine("UDC file # " + CountUdcFiles.ToString() + ": " + UdcConnection.DisplayName.ToString()) Next Console.WriteLine("Total UDC files on server: " + CountUdcFiles.ToString()) Console.Write("Press Enter to Continue") Console.ReadLine() Catch ex As Exception Console.WriteLine("Error: " + ex.Message) Console.Write("Press Enter to Continue") Console.ReadLine() End Try

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Category { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Category : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the category of a Universal Data Connection (UDC) file located in the central data connection store on a server farm.
Docs.value: A string representing the category to which the data connection file is assigned.

remarks.para: There are no built-in categories, but assigning categories can be useful if you intend to manage many UDC files that connect to various data stores.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DataConnectionFileName As String
public: property System::String ^ DataConnectionFileName { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the Universal Data Connection (UDC) file represented by the object.
Docs.value: The name of the Universal Data Connection (UDC) file.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Description : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the description of a Universal Data Connection (UDC) file located in a SharePoint Data Connection Library.

remarks.para: The property is an optional field and may be blank.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DisplayName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DisplayName : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name displayed in the library of a Universal Data Connection (UDC) file located in the data connection library.
Docs.value: A string representing the display name of the data connection file.

remarks.para: The property is a required field.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string[] EnumerateDependants() cil managed

Docs.summary: Enumerates all dependant form templates of a Universal Data Connection (UDC) file located in the central data connection store on a server farm.
Docs.returns: A one dimensional array of strings representing the file names of the form templates that are dependants of the UDC file.

remarks.para: Use the property to determine if a UDC file has dependant form templates.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HasDependants As Boolean
public: property bool HasDependants { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether any form templates on the server are dependant on the Universal Data Connection (UDC) file located in the central data connection store.
Docs.value: A boolean value indicating whether the data connection file is dependant on other data connection files.

remarks.para: Use the method to determine the specific dependant form templates.
